alertMessage: Timeouts on streaming connections are enabled

configFile.content:
apiVersion: kubelet.config.k8s.io/v1beta1
featureGates:
  RotateKubeletClientCertificate: false
streamingConnectionIdleTimeout: 0
authentication:
  anonymous:
    enabled: false
  webhook:
    cacheTTL: 0s
    enabled: true
authorization:
  mode: Webhook
  webhook:
    cacheAuthorizedTTL: 0s
    cacheUnauthorizedTTL: 0s
